name: Godot Roguelike Tutorial
description:
I made a series on YouTube about making a roguelike with the Godot Game Engine. This demo is the final result. Explore a random generated dungeon and fight enemies.

Controls: 

  • Move: wasd or arrows
  • Attack: left mouse button
  • Strong attack: hold left mouse button

Art made by o_lobster: https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack. You are the best bro!

YouTube playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2-ArCpIQtjELkyLKec8BaVVCeunuHSK9
